entries.rider_opposing_faction: You are trying to ride in a vehicle driven by a member of an opposing faction.
entries.rider_has_tef: You have a Temporary Enemy Flag, and cannot board a vehicle as a passenger until it expires.
entries.rider_in_combat: You are currently in combat, and you cannot board a vehicle as a passenger until your in-combat status expires.
entries.rider_overt_driver_not: You are an overt factional member, and you cannot ride in a vehicle driven by a non-aligned or covert factional member.
